name: Fix YouTube Comment Lengths
description: On YouTube, comments longer than four lines get cut off with a "read more" link. In recent versions, I've noticed that link doesn't appear and comments are cut off! This "style" will fix that.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)
